subject: Re: [junit] Junit Design Patterns.
msgSnippet: ... To my knowledge, TogetherSoft no longer has a free Whiteboard edition. They discontinued that a couple years ago and I haven t heard that they ve
messageBody:
On Thu, 2002-10-10 at 14:04, Thach Nguyen wrote:
> Farenn,
>
> If you read UML, go to www.togethersoft.com and download their
> whiteboard version (free). With this installed, you can feed in junit
> java/class files and reverse engineer junit from code to see the design.

To my knowledge, TogetherSoft no longer has a free Whiteboard edition.
They discontinued that a couple years ago and I haven't heard that
they've reinstated it.

Dave
